title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.3 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.3 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term premiums used as a basis of allocation means that the allocation of expenses shall follow the percentages of applicable premiums. (b) The term special studies used as a basis of allocation means that expenses shall be analyzed and bases of allocation applied as dictated by that analysis. (c) The term overhead on salaries used as a basis of allocation means that the allocation of expenses shall follow the percentages of the applicable salaries allocation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
106.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
